title: Launch Day Runbook
description: Create a comprehensive operational runbook with monitoring dashboards, rollback procedures, communication templates, and escalation paths for launch day.
instructions:
Build a complete launch day operations system:

1. Create a LaunchDayDashboard widget showing real-time metrics:
   - Active users (with geographic distribution)
   - Error rate and top errors
   - API response times
   - App store ratings and reviews

2. Implement RollbackManager class with:
   - Staged rollback (reduce rollout percentage)
   - Full rollback to previous version
   - Feature flag kill switches
   - Database migration rollback

3. Create CommunicationTemplates for:
   - Status page updates
   - User notification messages
   - Team Slack alerts
   - Executive summary emails

4. Build EscalationManager with:
   - Severity level definitions (P1-P4)
   - On-call rotation lookup
   - Automatic escalation timers
   - PagerDuty/Opsgenie integration

5. Implement IncidentTracker for:
   - Incident creation and timeline
   - Action items assignment
   - Post-mortem generation
   - Metrics impact calculation

hints.text: For real-time metrics, use StreamProvider with WebSocket or Server-Sent Events connection to your monitoring backend
Store escalation SLAs as constants: P1=15min, P2=30min, P3=2hr, P4=24hr and use Timer to check for breaches
For Slack Block Kit messages, use sections with mrkdwn type for formatted text and actions array for interactive buttons

commonMistakes.mistake: Not testing rollback procedures before launch
commonMistakes.consequence: Rollback fails during actual incident, extending downtime
commonMistakes.correction: Run rollback drills in staging environment before every major release

commonMistakes.mistake: Having only one escalation path (e.g., only Slack)
commonMistakes.consequence: Critical alerts missed if primary channel is down or person is unavailable
commonMistakes.correction: Implement redundant alerting through multiple channels: Slack + PagerDuty + SMS
